moves: 1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 Nf6 5. Nc3 a6 6. f3 Qb6 7. Nb3 e6 8. g4 Nc6 9. Qe2
1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 Nf6 5. Nc3 a6 6. f3 Qb6 7. Nb3 e6 8. g4 Nc6 9. Qe2 d5
comment:
It's an early visit
to Planet Shirov!  Only someone like Alexei could contemplate such a move at
an early stage.  Still underdeveloped and with his king in the center, Shirov
simply sacrifices a pawn.

moves: 1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 Nf6 5. Nc3 a6 6. f3 Qb6 7. Nb3 e6 8. g4 Nc6 9. Qe2 d5 10. Be3 d4 11. Bf2 Bc5 12. a3 Qc7 13. O-O-O Bxa3 14. bxa3 dxc3 15. Bc5 e5 16. Qe3 Nd4 17. g5 Nh5 18. Qxc3 Nxb3+ 19. cxb3 Be6 20. Kb2 Rc8 21. Bb4 Qxc3+ 22. Bxc3
comment: After the dust has cleared, white has a small plus thanks to the bishop-pair.

moves: 1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 Nf6 5. Nc3 a6 6. f3 Qb6 7. Nb3 e6 8. g4 Nc6 9. Qe2 d5 10. Be3 d4 11. Bf2 Bc5 12. a3 Qc7 13. O-O-O Bxa3 14. bxa3 dxc3 15. Bc5 e5 16. Qe3 Nd4 17. g5 Nh5 18. Qxc3 Nxb3+ 19. cxb3 Be6 20. Kb2 Rc8 21. Bb4 Qxc3+ 22. Bxc3 f6 23. gxf6 gxf6 24. Rd6 Nf4 25. Bd2
comment:
White's now going to be a little better in the endgame due to the doubled
f-pawns.
